content: and include a link to the pattern listing if selling the finished piece online thank you share your work follow along on instagram at @jenhayescreations tag @jenhayescreations and use the hashtag #jenhayescreations to show off your creations and of course link your projects to the design here on ravelry i m so excited to see what you ll create follow me blog www jenhayescreations com pinterest www pinterest com/jenhayescreations/ instagram www instagram com/jenhayescreations/ facebook www facebook com/jenhayescreations/ youtube https //www youtube com/@jenhayescreations
